about.details:
Incorporated in February 2009, Gala Precision Engineering Limited is a manufacturer of precision components such as disc and strip springs (DSS), coil and spiral springs (CSS), and special fastening solutions (SFS). The company supplies these products to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs).

The company's products are used in sectors such as electrical, off-highway equipment, infrastructure, and general engineering, as well as in mobility segments such as automotive and railway.

The company has supplied its technical springs and high tensile fasteners to customers in several countries including Germany, Denmark, China, Italy, Brazil, USA, Sweden, and Switzerland, making it a crucial link in the global supply chain for OEMs.

The company's business primarily comprises of two divisions:

(i) the Springs Technology Division manufactures DSS, including Wedge Lock Washers (WLW) and CSS,

(ii) SFS, producing anchor bolts, studs, and nuts.

As of March 30, 2024, the company has more than 175 customers in 25 plus countries such as Germany, Denmark, China, Italy, Brazil, USA, Sweden and Switzerland.

The company has two manufacturing facilities in Wada District, Palghar, Maharashtra, with capabilities to design, develop, and manufacture a diverse product portfolio. Additionally, a new manufacturing facility is being set up in Vallam-Vadagal, SIPCOT, Sriperumbudur, Tamil Nadu, focusing on developing high-tensile fasteners to expand the product portfolio with new products like bolts.

As of June 30, 2024, the company has 294 permanent employees and 390 contract employees. The permanent workforce includes 182 manufacturing workers, 19 employees for stores and logistics, 19 employees for quality assurance, 14 employees for tool room development and maintenance, and 22 employees for human resources and administration.

faqs.question: What is the Gala Precision Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer:
Gala Precision Engineering IPO is a main-board IPO of 3174416 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹167.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹529 per share. The minimum order quantity is 28.

The IPO opens on September 2, 2024, and closes on September 4, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Gala Precision Engineering IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Gala Precision Engineering IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Gala Precision Engineering IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Gala Precision Engineering IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Gala Precision Engineering IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Gala Precision Engineering IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Gala Precision Engineering IPO opens on September 2, 2024 and closes on September 4, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Gala Precision Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: Gala Precision Engineering IPO lot size is 28, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,812.

faqs.question: How to apply for Gala Precision Engineering IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Gala Precision Engineering IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Gala Precision Engineering IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Gala Precision Engineering IPO will be done on Thursday, September 5, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, September 6, 2024. Check the Gala Precision Engineering IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Gala Precision Engineering IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Gala Precision Engineering IPO listing date is on Monday, September 9, 2024.
